Html:
Hi from Colombia,

 

I thank you for your effort extending the bibliography styles for documents in Microsoft Word.

In Colombia, we have a special standard for creating the bibliography for technical documents which is the NTC 5613.

NTC 5613 is managed by ICONTEC (Colombian Institute of Technical Standards and Certification) (http://www.icontec.org.co).

This standard is specified in Spanish.

Can you help with the creation of the ICONTEC NTC 5613 Bibliography Style for Word? I can translate the standard for you.

 

Waiting for you replay. Thanks.
